title: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: The Help view does not respond to keyboard navigation when initially loaded.
EB: The Help view should be loaded in a way that allows immediate navigation via the keyboard.
SR:
1. Open the Help view.
2. Attempt to navigate through the Help view using the keyboard without clicking anywhere.
3. Observe that the navigation does not work.
4. Click on one of the 'live' areas mentioned, such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
5. Observe that the navigation now works as expected.
